plugins.description: Revolutionary four-tier agent architecture with 27 specialized agents, 19 skills, and 39 commands. Features pattern learning, quality control, full-stack validation, intelligent automation, and 80-90% auto-fix success. Critical cache_control error completely resolved in v7.6.7 - production ready with 60-70% cost reduction and full emergency fix deployment.
